ygData.subject: RE: New Patch
ygData.msgSnippet: Jaxim, there are many very powerful items in the game and there are other containers that reduce weight 100%, not a real big deal actually, they are lore so it
ygData.messageBody:
Jaxim,

there are many very powerful items in the game and there are other
containers that reduce weight 100%, not a real big deal actually, they are
lore so it not like you can stock up on them. We are not Beta testers,
these problems with "code" supposedly, should have been fixed a long time
ago. Them saying "there was an erorr in the code" is a scape goat that they
use to justify screwing with us, just like when they reduced the amount of
damage our DD spell, retribution does.

Bree


>From: "I. G" <shadowtg1@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] New Patch
>Date: Tue, 14 Sep 1999 11:55:15 PDT
>
>From: "I. G" <shadowtg1@...>
>
>well with this I can believe it.. I mean come on folks... an item that
>redueces all weight??? a tad powerful if ya ask me..
>
>Jaxim
>
>
>

>>

>>
>>You know what they're going to say: "It was always meant to be this way,
>>there was an error in the database which has now been fixed."
>>
>>Elbeno
